Description.Text: Other amenities/services: Rooms with Direct Dial Telephone, Hydro Massage. 24 hour room service, Safe deposit box at the reception, Photocopiers, Secretarial services, Fax service, Currency exchange, Charged Baby Sitter Service, Laundry service, Lift, Car rental, Concierge, Shuttle/ Pick-Up service.
Important place or monument close to hotel: Nearest airport: Airport - 85km.
